text: László Sólyom (, ; born 3 January 1942–8 October 2023) is a Hungarian politician, lawyer, and librarian. He was the President of Hungary from 2005 until 2010.'Kein Ende in Sicht,' in Budapester Zeitung, September 2009 ==Death== Sólyom died of cancer on 8 October 2023, at the age of 81, in Budapest. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Hungary
title: László Sólyom
